tei:licence.tei:p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) License applies to this text.
The CC BY 4.0 License also applies to this TEI XML file.

tei:sourceDesc.tei:p: This compilation aims to present all identifiable locations where Arthur Schnitzler (1862–1931) stayed, in an easy-to-use list format.
